title: Give Me Forever Love
description: Bryce’s world comes crashing down when someone from the outside gets too close. Kathrine is devastated, no longer knowing how her future will go.Bryce and Kathrine grew up in darkness, surrounded by disappointment, but with pure determination they fought to become better than their parents. Love was not easy to find and even found it was not easy to accept.Being locked up was not part of his plans, but sometimes even the mightiest of men fall.Will Kat be there during his darkest moments or will she choose to move on, remembering what she was taught… that everyone leaves eventually?
author: Paige P. Horne
